description: Dalgona Challenges - XSS vulnerability practice application running on Flask/Werkzeug. This is a CTF-style security training platform for XSS exploitation practice.

endpoints: / (GET) - Main index page with challenge overview
/level13 (GET) - XSS Challenge Level 13 - Triangle difficulty (blacklist: script, onerror, onclick, onmouseover, single quote, space)

notes: Intentionally vulnerable XSS application used for training/testing purposes. Key security findings: X-XSS-Protection header disabled on /level13, allows testing XSS payloads with PhantomJS validation. Primary attack surface: XSS injection on /level13 endpoint.
